data.name: AboutView_Donate_Text
data.value: Hasznosnak találja a SyncTrayzort? Kérem, adományozzon az én jótékonysági alapítványom számára.

data.name: AboutView_DownloadNewVersion
data.comment: Clickable link allowing the user to download the latest version of SyncTrayzor

data.name: AboutView_NewAppVersionAvailable
data.comment: Prompt showing the user that a new version of SynTrayzor is available {0}: Latest version of SyncTrayzor

data.name: AboutView_SyncthingVersion
data.comment: Information showing the user the current version of Syncthing {0}: Current Syncthing version

data.name: AboutView_UnknownVersion
data.comment: Shown within AboutView_SyncthingVersion if Syncthing's version couldn't be determined

data.name: AboutView_Version
data.comment: Information showing the user the current version of SyncTrayzor {0}: Current SyncTrayzor version

data.name: BarAlertsView_Conflict_AlertText
data.comment: Text shown at the start of the alert bar, when the user has conflicted files. {0}: The number of conflicts

data.name: BarAlertsView_Conflict_ResolveLink
data.comment: Clickable link shown next to ConflictsAlertView_AlertText, allowing the user to resolve the conflicts.

data.name: BarAlertsView_FailedTransfer_AlertText
data.comment: Text show in a bar alert at the top of the screen when there are 1 or more folders with failing transfers. {0}: List of folders with failing file transfers

data.name: BarAlertsView_FailedTransfer_Details
data.value: További adatok a Syncthing ablakban vagy konzolon.
data.comment: Text shown to the right of BarAlertsView_FailedTransfer_AlertText, in non-bold text

data.name: BarAlertsView_IntelXeGraphics_AlertText
data.value: Intel Xe monitorvezérlő használata esetén az alábbi terület üres lehet. Ilyen esetben tiltsa le a hardveres gyorsítást a Fájl -⁠> Beállítások menüben.
data.comment: Warning shown at the top of a page if Intel Xe graphics are detected

data.name: BarAlertsView_PausedDevicesFromMetering_AlertText
data.value: A következő {0:p:eszköz leállt|eszközök leálltak}, mert forgalmi díjas hálózaton {0:p:üzemel|üzemelnek}: {0:list:{}|, }.
data.comment: {0}: List of paused devices

data.name: ConflictResolutionView_Button_Choose
data.comment: Button shown next to each conflicted file, allowing the user to choose that version of the file as the one they want to keep (and deleting the other versions)

data.name: ConflictResolutionView_ChooseDescription
data.value: Adja meg a fájl megtartandó változatát. A többi változatot töröljük.

data.name: ConflictResolutionView_ChooseNewest_Text
data.value: Ha az eredeti fájl utolsó módosítása a legfrissebb, akkor azt tartjuk meg, egyébként a legutóbb létrehozott ütköző fájlt.

data.name: ConflictResolutionView_ChooseOriginal_Text
data.value: Minden ütközésnél az eredetit tartjuk meg, a többit töröljük.

data.name: ConflictResolutionView_DeleteToRecycleBin
data.value: A törölt fájlok végleges törlés helyett a lomtárba kerüljenek..

data.name: ConflictResolutionView_Dialog_Failed_Message
data.comment:
Content of the dialog shown when resolving a conflict failed.
{0}: Exception message

data.name: ConflictResolutionView_Header_ConflictCreated
data.comment: Header shown above the list of times at which each confliction version of the file was created, and is shown when the user selects a conflict

data.name: ConflictResolutionView_Header_ConflictingFileName
data.comment: Header shown above a list of file names of each conflicting version of the file, and is shown when the user selects a conflict

data.name: ConflictResolutionView_Header_File
data.comment: Header shown above the filename of each conflicted file in the main body of the window

data.name: ConflictResolutionView_Header_Folder
data.comment: Header shown above the folder containing each conflicted file in the main body of the window

data.name: ConflictResolutionView_Header_LastModified
data.comment: Header shown above the 'Last Modified' column. This is used both in the main body (to show when the original file in the conflict was last modified), and above each version of the conflict

data.name: ConflictResolutionView_Header_ModifiedBy
data.comment: Header shown above the 'Modified by' entry, which contains the name of the device which last modified the file, and is shown when the user selects a conflict

data.name: ConflictResolutionView_Header_OriginalFile
data.comment: Header shown above the 'Original File' entry, which contains the name of the original file in the conflict, and is shown when the user selects a conflict

data.name: ConflictResolutionView_Scanning_CancelButton
data.comment: Text on the 'Cancel' button, shown next to the 'Scanning' progress bar at the top of the page when scanning is in progress

data.name: ConflictResolutionView_Scanning_Label
data.comment: Text shown next to the 'Scanning' progress bar at the top of the page, when scanning is in progress

data.name: ConflictResolutionView_Status_NoConflicts
data.comment: Text shown in the main body of the window when we've finished scanning for conflicts, and didn't find any

data.name: ConflictResolutionView_Status_Scanning
data.comment: Text shown in the main body of the window when we're scanning for conflicts, but haven't yet found any

data.name: ConflictResolutionView_Status_SyncthingNotRunning
data.value: A Syncthing nem fut. Kérjük, indítsa el a Syncthinget.
data.comment: Text shown in the main body of the window when Syncthing isn't running (which means that we can't start scanning for conflicts)

data.name: ConflictResolutionView_Title
data.comment: Shown in the title bar of the Conflict Resolver window

data.name: ConfliectResolutionView_ChooseMultipleDescription
data.value: {0} ütközés van kiválasztva. Adja meg a feloldás módját. A többi változatot töröljük.

data.name: Dialog_ConfirmKillAllProcesses_Message
data.value:
Biztosan bezárjuk az összes Syncthing folyamatot, beleértve a nem SyncTrayzor által kezelteket is?
Ez elronthatja a Syncthing adatbázisait. CSAK akkor használjuk, ha a Syncthing másik Syncthing folyamat miatt nem képes elindulni.
data.comment: Body for the dialog show when the user clicks on ShellView_Menu_Syncthing_KillAll

data.name: Dialog_ConfirmKillAllProcesses_Title
data.comment: Title for the dialog shown when the user clicks on ShellView_Menu_Syncthing_KillAll

data.name: Dialog_FailedToStartSyncthing_Message
data.value:
A Syncthing indítása sikertelen.
Az okok kiderítése érdekében, kérjük, olvassa el a naplófájlt.
Ha a "FATAL: Cannot open database" üzenet jelenik meg, zárja be a Syncthing minden példányát. Ha korábban a SyncTrayzor összeomlott, még lehetnek tetszhalott Syncthing példányok. Használja a "Syncthing" menü "Minden Syncthing folyamat bezárása" menüpontját, majd "Syncthing" -> "Indítás" menüponttal indítsa újra a Syncthing-et.
data.comment:
Content of the dialog shown when Syncthing couldn't be started (and exited with an error). Instructs the user on how to proceed.
"FATAL: Cannot Open Database" should remain in English
The menu option "Syncthing ->Kill all Syncthing processes" corresponds to ShellView_Menu_Syncthing_KillAll, while "Syncthing ->Start" corresponds to ShellView_Menu_Syncthing_Start

data.name: Dialog_FailedToStartSyncthing_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog shown when Syncthing couldn't be started (and exited with an error)

data.name: Dialog_SyncthingBlockedByGroupPolicy_Message
data.comment: Content of dialog shown when Syncthing couldn't start because of group policy settings (probably) {0}: Exact exception message {1}: Path to Syncthing executable

data.name: Dialog_SyncthingBlockedByGroupPolicy_Title
data.comment: Title of dialog shown when Syncthing couldn't start because of group policy settings (probably)

data.name: Dialog_SyncthingDidNotStart_Message
data.value: A Syncthing indítása sikertelen: {0}. Lehetséges okok a Syncthing konzolon találhatók..

data.name: FileTranfersTrayView_Header_Downloading
data.comment: Header for section containing downloading files

data.name: FileTransfersTrayView_Deleted
data.comment: Show after the 'x minutes ago' text if the update was a deletion

data.name: FileTransfersTrayView_Downloading_RateKnown
data.comment: Displayed when a large file is downloaded {0}: amount downloaded so far (inserted as e.g. 4KB) {1}: The total amount to download {2}: The current download rate, e.g. 2.0MB

data.name: FileTransfersTrayView_Downloading_RateUnknown
data.comment: Displayed when a large file is downloaded {0}: amount downloaded so far (inserted as e.g. 4KB) {1}: The total amount to download

data.name: FileTransfersTrayView_Header_RecentlyUpdated
data.comment: Header for section containing files that were recently downloaded or deleted

data.name: FileTransfersTrayView_InConnectionRate
data.comment: {0}: a value such as '1.2kb'

data.name: FileTransfersTrayView_OutConnectionRate
data.comment: {0}: a value such as '1.2kb'

data.name: Generic_Dialog_Cancel
data.comment: 'Cancel' button shown in various dialogs

data.name: Generic_Dialog_Close
data.comment: 'Close' button shown on various dialogs

data.name: Generic_Dialog_No
data.comment: 'No' button shown on various dialogs

data.name: Generic_Dialog_OK
data.comment: 'OK' button shown on various dialogs

data.name: Generic_Dialog_Save
data.comment: 'Save' button shown on various dialogs

data.name: Generic_Dialog_Yes
data.comment: 'Yes' button shown on various dialogs

data.name: NewVersionAlertView_Button_DontRemind
data.comment: When a new version is available, the user receives a prompt. This button allows the user to say they want want to be prompted to upgrade to this particular version again

data.name: NewVersionAlertView_Button_Download
data.comment: When a new version is available, the user receives a prompt. This button allows them to download the new version

data.name: NewVersionAlertView_Button_RemindLater
data.comment: When a new version is available, the user receives a prompt. This button allows them to say they want to be prompted the next time they start SyncTrayzor

data.name: NewVersionAlertView_DontRemindMeExplanation
data.value: Erre a változatra nem figyelmeztet többet. Az új változatokra vonatkozó figyelmeztetés letiltható a Beállítások lapon. A Súgó -> Névjegy lapon kérhető verzió ellenőrzés.
data.comment: When a new version is available, the user receives a prompt. This message tells the user how to permanently disable new version prompts. 'The Settings page' corresponds to ShellView_Menu_File. 'Help ->About' corresponds to ShellView_Menu_Help_About.

data.name: NewVersionAlertView_NewVersionAvailable
data.comment: When a new version is available, the user receives a prompt. This text appears at the top of that prompt

data.name: NewVersionAlertView_Title
data.comment: When a new version is available, the user receives a prompt. This is the title of that prompt.

data.name: SettingsView_AlertOnNewVersion
data.value: Tájékoztatást kérek, ha van elérhető SyncTrayzor frissítés

data.name: SettingsView_Alerts_Description
data.value: A figyelmeztetések a SyncTrayzor ablak fölső részén lévő csíkban jelennek meg, a tálcaikonon pedig egy figyelemfelhívó háromszög látható.

data.name: SettingsView_CannotSetAutoStart_Message
data.value: Nem lehet beállítani az automatikus indítást. Talán valamely víruskereső miatt.

data.name: SettingsView_CloseToTray
data.comment: Setting allowing the user to indicate that the 'close' button on the top right of the window should put Syncthing down into the tray, rather than closing the application

data.name: SettingsView_Logging_LogLevel
data.comment: Label shown before SyncTrayzor logging level ComboBox

data.name: SettingsView_Logging_LogLevel_Debug
data.comment: Name for the Debug log level (which provides lots of debug info)

data.name: SettingsView_Logging_LogLevel_Info
data.comment: Name for the Info log level

data.name: SettingsView_Logging_LogLevel_Trace
data.comment: Name for the Trace log level (which provides the most debug info)

data.name: SettingsView_Logging_ShowSyncTrayzorLog
data.comment: Text on button which will open Explorer at the location of SyncTrayzor's log file

data.name: SettingsView_Logging_ShowSyncthingLog
data.comment: Text on button which will open Explorer at the location of Syncthing's log file

data.name: SettingsView_MeteredNetworks
data.value: Forgalmi díjas hálózathoz kapcsolódó eszközök szüneteltetése

data.name: SettingsView_MeteredNetworks_NotSupported
data.value: Ez a funkció csak Windows 8, vagy újabb rendszeren használható.

data.name: SettingsView_MinimizeToTray
data.comment: Setting allowing the user to indicate that the 'minimize' button on the top right of the window should put Syncthing down into the tray, rather than minimizing the application

data.name: SettingsView_RestartSyncTrayzor_Message
data.value:
A változtatások életbe lépéséhez újra kell indítani a SyncTrayzort.
Indítsuk újra a SyncTrayzort most?

data.name: SettingsView_RestartSyncthing_Message
data.value:
A változtatások életbe lépéséhez újra kell indítani a Syncthinget.
Indítsuk újra a Syncthinget most?

data.name: SettingsView_Section_Advanced
data.comment: Section header for advanced settings

data.name: SettingsView_Section_StartOnLogin
data.comment: Section header for settings to do with automatically starting SyncTrayzor when the user logs in

data.name: SettingsView_Section_SyncTrayzor
data.comment: Section header for settings to do with configuring SyncTrayzor

data.name: SettingsView_Section_Syncthing
data.comment: Section header for settings to do with configuring Syncthing

data.name: SettingsView_ShowSynchronizedBalloonIfNoFilesTransferred
data.value: A "Szinkronizálva" értesítés mutatása akkor is, ha nem történt fájlfrissítés

data.name: SettingsView_StartMinimized
data.comment: Setting allowing the user to specify that, when SyncTrayzor is started automatically on login, it should start in the tray, rather than being visible to the user

data.name: SettingsView_StartOnLogin
data.comment: Setting allowing the user to specify that SyncTrayzor should be started when the user logs in

data.name: SettingsView_StartOnLogin_PermissionDenied
data.value: Engedély megtagadva. Ezen beállítások megváltoztatásához a SyncTrayzort rendszergazdaként kell futtatni.
data.comment: Message displayed instead of SettingsView_StartOnLogin SettingsView_StartMinimized when the user doesn't have permission to edit the registry

data.name: SettingsView_StartSyncthingAutomatically
data.comment: Setting allowing the user to specify that Syncthing should be start automatically when SyncTrayzor starts

data.name: SettingsView_SyncthingAddress_ToolTip
data.value: A SyncTrayzor felülbírálja a Syncthing beállításaiban megadott "GUI figyelési cím"-et. Itt viszont bármilyen érték megadható.
data.comment: ToolTip shown when a user hovers over the SettingsView_SyncthingAddress text input. This shows more information on the input.

data.name: SettingsView_SyncthingCustomHomePath_ToolTip
data.value: Ha be van állítva, felülírja a Syncthing adatbázisát és beállításait tartalmazó alapértelmezett útvonalat.

data.name: SettingsView_SyncthingDenyUpgrade_ToolTip
data.value: Ez akkor lehet hasznos, ha egy új Syncthing frissítés nem fér össze a SyncTrayzorral. Ekkor vissza kell térni a SyncTrayzor mappában lévő Syncthing korábbi változatához.

data.name: SettingsView_Syncthing_ProcessPriority_AboveNormal
data.comment: Should match value in Task Manager, if you right-click a process ->'Set Priority'

data.name: SettingsView_Syncthing_ProcessPriority_BelowNormal
data.comment: Should match value in Task Manager, if you right-click a process ->'Set Priority'

data.name: SettingsView_Syncthing_ProcessPriority_Idle
data.comment: Should match value in Task Manager, if you right-click a process ->'Set Priority'

data.name: SettingsView_Syncthing_ProcessPriority_Normal
data.comment: Should match value in Task Manager, if you right-click a process ->'Set Priority'

data.name: SettingsView_Tab_SyncTrayzor
data.comment: 'SyncTrayzor' settings tab

data.name: SettingsView_Tab_Syncthing
data.comment: 'Syncthing' settings tab

data.name: SettingsView_Title
data.comment: Title of the 'settings' dialog

data.name: SettingsView_UseComputerCulture
data.value: Használja a számítógépen beállított nyelvet, ha elérhető.

data.name: SettingsView_Validation_InvalidUrl
data.comment: Validation message (shown in red) below the SettingsView_SyncthingAddress field when the user enters a value which is not a value URL

data.name: SettingsView_Validation_NotShouldBeEmpty
data.comment: Validation message (shown in red) below the SettingsView_SyncthingAddress field when the user makes this field empty

data.name: SettingsView_Validation_SyncthingCommandLineFlagsMustHaveFormat
data.value: A kötelező formátum: '-kapcsoló' vagy '-kapcsoló=érték' vagy '-kapcsoló="érték szóközökkel"'

data.name: SettingsView_WatchedFolderEnabledInSyncthing
data.value: Egy vagy több mappára fájlrendszerfigyelőt engedélyezett a Syncthingben, ezért a megfelelő figyelők a Synctrayzorban tiltottak lesznek.
data.comment: Text shown below the list of folders in the settings if the filesystem watcher for one or more folders has been enabled in Syncthing, meaning that SyncTrayzor's filesystem watcher for the corresponding folder(s) will be disabled

data.name: SettingsView_WatchedFolderEnabledInSyncthing_Note
data.comment: Text shown in bold just before SettingsView_WatchedFolderEnabledInSyncthing

data.name: SettingsView_WatchedFolders_Explanation
data.value:
Figyelt: A mappa változásainak követése, ezáltal hosszabb lekérdezési időtartam is megadható a Syncthingben.
Értesítések: "Szinkronizált" értesítés mutatása, amikor a mappa fájljai frissültek.

data.name: SettingsView_WatchedFolders_Unavailable
data.value: Nincsenek mappák. Kérjük, indítsa a Syncthinget

data.name: ShellView_Donate
data.comment: Shown in the top right of the menu bar, if the user hasn't yet donated

data.name: ThirdPartyComponentsView_Intro
data.value: A SyncTrayzor több, nyílt forráskódú összetevőt tartalmaz, nélkülük nem is létezne.. Alább ezeknek az összetevőknek a részletei, licensz szövegei láthatók.

data.name: TranslatorAttributation
data.comment: Shown on the 'about' page, this is space for you to attribute yourself. E.g. your local language equivalent of "Kingon translation by My Name". Add yourself to this field if you contribute to the translation for this language.

data.name: TrayIcon_Balloon_DeviceConnected_Message
data.comment: Message of tray icon balloon show when another device connects {0}: device name

data.name: TrayIcon_Balloon_DeviceConnected_Title
data.comment: Title of tray icon balloon when another device connected

data.name: TrayIcon_Balloon_DeviceDisconnected_Message
data.comment: Message of tray icon balloon show when another device disconnects {0}: device name

data.name: TrayIcon_Balloon_DeviceDisconnected_Title
data.comment: Title of tray icon balloon when another device disconnected

data.name: TrayIcon_Balloon_DeviceRejected_Message
data.value: Ez az eszköz csatlakozni próbál: {0} ({1}). Indítsa el a SyncTrayzort az eszköz hozzáadásához
data.comment: Balloon shown when device is rejected. {0}: Device ID {1}: Device Address

data.name: TrayIcon_Balloon_FinishedSyncing_DeletedFile
data.comment: {0}: Number of files that were deleted

data.name: TrayIcon_Balloon_FinishedSyncing_DeletedFileWithFailures
data.comment: {0}: Number of files that were deleted {1}: Number of failures

data.name: TrayIcon_Balloon_FinishedSyncing_DeletedSingleFile
data.comment: {0}: ID of folder which finished synchronizing {1}: File that was deleted

data.name: TrayIcon_Balloon_FinishedSyncing_FailedToDeleteSingleFile
data.comment: {0}: ID of folder which finished synchronizing {1}: File that failed to be deleted {2}: Failure reason

data.name: TrayIcon_Balloon_FinishedSyncing_FailedToUpdateSingleFile
data.comment: {0}: ID of folder which finished synchronizing {1}: File that failed to be updated {2}: Failure reason

data.name: TrayIcon_Balloon_FinishedSyncing_Message
data.comment:
Content of the balloon message shown when a folder finished synchronization
{0}:The name of the folder which finished synchronizing

data.name: TrayIcon_Balloon_FinishedSyncing_Multiple
data.comment: {0}: Folder that finished syncing {1}: List of things that happened. Can be a single TrayIcon_Balloon_FinishedSyncing_UpdatedFile or TrayIcon_Balloon_FinishedSyncing_UpdatedFileWithFailures, a single TrayIcon_Balloon_FinishedSyncing_DeletedFile or TrayIcon_Balloon_FinishedSyncing_DeletedFileWithFailures, or one of each (e.g. output might be 'MyFolder: Updated 2 files', 'MyFolder: Updated 1 file; Deleted 2 files', or 'MyFolder: Updated 2 files (1 failure); Deleted 2 files')

data.name: TrayIcon_Balloon_FinishedSyncing_UpdatedFile
data.comment: {0}: Number of files that were updated

data.name: TrayIcon_Balloon_FinishedSyncing_UpdatedFileWithFailures
data.comment: {0}: Number of files that were updated {1}: Number of failures

data.name: TrayIcon_Balloon_FinishedSyncing_UpdatedSingleFile
data.comment: {0}: ID of folder which finished synchronizing {1}: File that was updated

data.name: TrayIcon_Balloon_FolderRejected_Message
data.value: Ez az eszköz: {0} meg akarja osztani ezt a mappát: {1}. Indítsa el a SyncTrayzort a mappa hozzáadásához
data.comment: Balloon shown when folder is rejected. {0}: Device name {1}: Folder ID

data.name: TrayIcon_Menu_CloseToTray
data.comment: Menu option available when right-clicking the tray icon. Instructs SyncTrayzor to minimize itself to the tray

data.name: TrayIcon_Menu_Exit
data.comment: Menu option available when right-clicking the tray icon. Instructs SyncTrayzor to exit

data.name: TrayIcon_Menu_OpenFolder
data.comment: Menu option available when right-clicking the tray icon. Is a header for a list of folders, each of which can be clicked to open it in Explorer

data.name: TrayIcon_Menu_RescanAllFolders
data.comment: Menu option available when right-clicking the tray icon. Allows the user to re-scan all folders

data.name: TrayIcon_Menu_RestartSyncthing
data.comment: Menu option available when right-clicking the tray icon. Instructs SyncTrayzor to restart

data.name: TrayIcon_Menu_Restore
data.comment: Menu option available when right-clicking the tray icon. Instructs SyncTrayzor to restore itself from the tray, and be visible to the user

data.name: TrayIcon_Menu_Settings
data.comment: Menu option available when right-clicking the tray icon. Instructs SyncTrayzor to show the Settings dialog

data.name: TrayIcon_Menu_StartSyncthing
data.comment: Menu option available when right-clicking the tray icon. Instructs SyncTrayzor to start Syncthing. Only available if Syncthing isn't running

data.name: TrayIcon_Menu_StopSyncthing
data.comment: Menu option available when right-clicking the tray icon. Instructs SyncTrayzor to stop Syncthing. Only available if Syncthing is running

data.name: UnhandledExceptionView_IntroMessage
data.value: Hoppá! Valami nagyon nem oké. A SyncTrayzor ki fog lépni. Bocsánat

data.name: UnhandledExceptionView_LogFileLocation_Description
data.comment: When an unhandled exception occurs, the user is informed that they may have to provide a log file

data.name: UnhandledExceptionView_LogFileLocation_Link
data.comment: Clickable text to open the location of the log file

data.name: UnhandledExceptionView_PleaseOpenIssue_Post
data.comment: When an unhandled exception occurs, the user is prompted to visit the Github issues page. This text appears immediately after the link to github, and also prompts the user to include the stack trace shown directly below this text

data.name: UnhandledExceptionView_PleaseOpenIssue_Pre
data.comment: When an unhandled exception occurs, the user is prompted to visit the Github issues page. This text appears immediately before the link to github

data.name: UnhandledExceptionView_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog shown when an unhandled exception occurs

data.name: ViewerView_BrowseToFolder
data.comment: Shown on a button next to the 'Folder Path' input in Syncthing's UI

data.name: ViewerView_OpenFolder
data.comment: Button shown in the web interface, alongside the native 'rescan' and 'edit' buttons. Allows the folder to be opened in Explorer

data.name: ViewerView_StartSyncthing
data.comment: Link show in the centre of the screen when Syncthing is stopped, allowing the user to start syncthing

data.name: ViewerView_SyncthingStarting
data.comment: Text shown in the centre of the screen when Syncthing is starting, but there's no UI to display yet

data.name: ViewerView_SyncthingStopped
data.comment: Text shown in the centre of the screen when Syncthing is stopped
